description:
Comfortably carry your day's gear to the office or campus. Storage options include padded compartments for your electronics, and pockets to keep you organized rather than digging for what you need.

  • Main compartment has an adjustable flap closure with buckle
  • Internal 15in. laptop compartment is padded to protect from bumps and drops
  • Dedicated tablet sleeve has a soft interior lining to protect from scratches
  • Side pocket expands to hold a water bottle or umbrella
  • Padded back panel and foam shoulder straps for carrying comfort
  • Lash point on front panel for attaching a bike light
name: Thule Lithos 20L Backpack - Unisex
